scrapeMatchList.title: Scrape list of matches
scrapeMatchList.description: Actor will scrape matches for given leagues, seasons and season types

years.title: Years to scrape
years.description: For sports, that have season partially in two years, use the year when season ends

seasonTypes.title: Season types to scrape
seasonTypes.description: Possible values: pre - Pre-season, reg - Regular season, post - Post-season (/Playoff), off - Off-season

leagues.title: Leagues to scrape
leagues.description: Possible values: mlb, nhl, nba, wnba, nfl

games.title: Games to scrape
games.description: Either game ID (e.g. 401461551), or game URL (e.g. https://www.espn.com/nhl/game/_/gameId/401461551)

gameDetailsLeague.title: League of games to scrape
gameDetailsLeague.description: Possible values: mlb, nhl, nba, wnba, nfl
